product_name: Hey HoneyDon't Miss A Spot Propolis Cleansing Foam
summary: SummaryHey Honey Don't Miss A Spot Propolis Cleansing Foam infused with Green Tea, gently and effectively purifies and balances oily and combination skin types while leaving the skin hydrated.
details: DetailsBenefitsCleanses away dirt and pollutants without over-drying the skinBalances the skin and improves surface hygienic conditionsPurges away dull skin and dead skin cells leaving a clear and healthy complexionControls sebum productionMade with over 97% natural ingredientsGreat for normal to oily, combination and complex skin typesClean beautyCruelty freeDermatologically Tested For Sensitive SkinKey IngredientsBee Propolis balances the skin so it is properly hydrated in the areas it needs it and controls sebum production in a controlled manner to clear acne, blemishes and hydrate the skinThe polyphenols found in Green Tea help to unclog pores and clear acne away as well as help to calm inflammationHoneysuckle helps to soothe and calm the skinFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesSLS and PhthalatesItem 2303370How To UseUse a small amount of foam and gently massage over face, avoiding eye area. Rinse with water.Precautions: For external use only.IngredientsAqua (Water), Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Lauryl Glucoside, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Glycerin, Propolis Extract, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Undecylenoyl Glycine, Maris Aqua (Sea Water), Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Parfum (Fragrance).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use a small amount of foam and gently massage over face, avoiding eye area. Rinse with water.Precautions: For external use only.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!!
reviews.comments: I have been using this facewash for a little over a month and I LOVE it!! I pair this with Hey Honey Propolis toner and have seen great results. My breakouts have subsided greatly, except for the occasional blemish from PMS.

reviews.headline: My new go to
reviews.comments: I love this face wash. My face feels amazing after I use it. I will say it took my skin a few weeks to get used to it but ever since that it's worked great. Just wish they sold it in stores.

reviews.headline: Works great, smells great
reviews.comments: Fantastic. Clears my skin, definitely helps to get my pimples under control and leaves my skin feeling super clean without drying me out. I love it!

reviews.headline: GREAT FOR MASK ACNE
reviews.comments: As a health care worker I've been struggling with horrible mask acne for the past year. Huge pores, tons of black heads, and pimples covering my chin and cheeks. My friend mentioned it could be yeast acne and not a lot of things treat it besides a trip to the dermatologist. I've always been a fan of hey honey but the price has kept me away from buying more products. This acne got to the point where I was willing to try anything and LET ME TELL YOU I'm glad I did. Using this cleanser with the 24/7 day and night moisturizer changed the game. It's not drying at all and it leaves my face feeling so clean. I use it once a day on my day off and twice a day when I work. The foam is a great consistency and one pump definitely does the job. I honestly have no complaints.

reviews.headline: Not Bad
reviews.comments: Purchased this one line bc I was running out of my usual cleanser and wanted to try something different. I guess I saw honey and got excited thinking it would at least have some kinda of maybe honey scent or something but sadly it didn't. The smell was a big turnoff for me but as I kept it anyway and gave it a try. I do love how it foams and does work very good in removing makeup, even stubborn mascara. I have combo to dry skin w/ oily T-zone and sensitive. This did not break me out at all. I was pretty happy with it although it didn't do anything special, overall it's a good cleanser. I would repurchase. That smell tho ....please change.

reviews.headline: SAVED MY SKIN!
reviews.comments:
In my late 30's due to illness I had to take quite a bit of super harsh drugs in high dosages including chemo...my forever perfect skin was destroyed. I had scaring, pot marks, dark spots, it was ruddy and oily, the entire composition of my skin changed and I was so upset. I tried everything including high priced products to reverse the damage and at least get back to where I didn't feel like I needed to wear makeup to go out, nothing worked. Then I remembered that I got a sample of this a while ago and I loved it! So I tried it again. 

I will never use another face cleansing product again. This is magic. My face is restored and although all of the damage will never disappear most of it has and I feel like myself again. I've been able to go back to wearing very little makeup and being confident again! This removes makeup and diet easily, it smells nice, and feels soft and not harsh. 

All of the Hey Honey products are a life saver in my book! I use multiple products and love them all!

reviews.headline: Overall ok cleanser
reviews.comments: I was skeptical on using this product at first since I have combo sensitive skin and anything will break me out. I've been using this for about 2 weeks now and I haven't had any issues with it. It does feel a bit drying on my skin but since it's summer and I'm super oily it's fine. I only use it at night and i apply tons of moisturizer after anyways so it's fine. I do feel that this might not be something I use during the winter. I also feel that my complexion does look brighter and my breakouts have diminished a lot, and this is the only new product I have added into my regimen.

reviews.headline: Outstanding cleanser
reviews.comments: I use this morning and night. Very gentle and effective.

reviews.headline: Gentle, no fragrance, and nice to use in the morning
reviews.comments: I like foaming face wash in the morning to get my skin ready for the day. This wash is very gentle and i can use it even on days where my skin is really sensitive. It gets my face clean without stripping my skin or making it feel tight. This isnt a deep clean face wash, but it is gentle and does enough. Would recommend this for anyone.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I just switched over to this face wash about 2 weeks ago. It's ok, I started breaking out a little bit, but could be due to other things. Smells good and is super gentle! Would probably be best for people with normal-dry skin. I just don't think it's strong/effective enough for my oily, acne prone skin.

reviews.headline: Made my face breakout
reviews.comments: Was excited to finally try this cleanser, but all it did was make my face breakout immediately after using. I legit thought for a second I was having an allergic reaction. Smells very nice though but naw I'll pass.

reviews.headline: Awesome facewash
reviews.comments: I love this foaming face cleanser! It's a great cleanser. I use in between facial treatments and in between exfoliating days. Definitely would recommend. I've been using it pretty regularly and so far no breakouts, no dry skin or anything

reviews.headline: Unique cleanser!
reviews.comments: Since I use this cleanser my complexion got much brighter and radiant!!! Amazing feeling and Very pleasent scent.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: This fast wash is great! I use it everyday. Its super gentle and has really helped to balance my skin and reduce the redness in my face.

reviews.headline: I love this cleanser
reviews.comments: I use this cleanser along with my Mia Sonic Cleanser to remove my makeup.  Between the two, the makeup is gone!  It doesn't dry my skin or make it feel tight.  My face just feels clean.  My only complaint would be the price, however, I don't mind to pay for a great product and this is a great product.

reviews.headline: Adore!
reviews.comments: I love Hey Honey! I adore this cleanser because it is a foam and you domt have to wet your skin when using until you rinse the cleanser off. I have super sensitive skin and had no reaction to this! It smells amazing and my dark circles under my eyes have actuallly improved using their products.

reviews.headline: I love this product line!
reviews.comments: I use this every morning and before I go to bed.  I love the honey smell.  It is a dense foam when you pump it out and does a good job of cleaning away any makeup.  I will definitely buy this again.  I want to try their moisturizer next.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Morning and evening wash

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Love this product! I use it everyday! I will be buying it again when I run outüòç

reviews.headline: Fresh Cleanser
reviews.comments: I love to use this every morning and night. It's quite addictive!!!!

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Improves skin tone. Much brighter complexion

display_values: Improves skin tone. Much brighter complexion

faceoff_positive.comments: I love Hey Honey! I adore this cleanser because it is a foam and you domt have to wet your skin when using until you rinse the cleanser off. I have super sensitive skin and had no reaction to this! It smells amazing and my dark circles under my eyes have actuallly improved using their products.
faceoff_positive.headline: Adore!

faceoff_negative.comments: Tried this after receiving samples of other items I loved. I have sensitive skin that produces extra oil during the day because it gets dry, but the extra oil can cause occasional blemishes. I use an acne cleansing foam from another company(in the am only) that alleviates this problem so thought I'd try Hey Honey's brand. It caused my face to get red and to produce more oil. After reading ingredients discovered it does have alcohol in it...not good for sensitive skin, so I can't use it. Am hoping to return this product. However, I will say the foam has a nice texture and smells pleasant.
faceoff_negative.headline: Be Careful with this Product

rollup.name: Don't Miss A Spot Propolis Cleansing Foam
